name: email-archive-worker
description: Cloudflare Worker for archiving emails to MinIO S3-compatible storage

scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:email-endpoint: node -e "console.log('Testing email endpoint...'); fetch('http://localhost:8787/__email', {method: 'POST', headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, body: JSON.stringify({from: 'test@example.com', to: 'archive@example.com', subject: 'Dev Test', content: 'Testing email endpoint'})}).then(r => r.json()).then(console.log).catch(console.error)"

author: Email Archive POC
